meanings.definition: Faster in speed or time than something else.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah is quicker than the turtle.
meanings.sent2: She finished the race quicker than anyone else.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit challenged the turtle to a race to see who was quicker.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked quicker than a computer, solving problems in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The car's acceleration was quicker than a bolt of lightning.

meanings.definition: In a quicker manner or way.
meanings.sent1: She ran quicker to catch up with her friends.
meanings.sent2: He typed quicker on the keyboard to finish his assignment.
meanings.sent3: The sloth moved quicker than usual when it smelled food.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to pass quicker during the exciting movie.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's heart beat quicker as the finish line approached.
